titles.title: A bill entitled the "Charles Evans Whittaker United States Courthouse Act".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16459)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure H.R. 2559 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Designates the United States Courthouse located at Ninth and Locust Streets, Kansas City, Missouri, as the Charles Evans Whittaker United States Courthouse.
